content.description: Meet Harold, the Backside Boulder. Sit down start on the left most part of his smile, right hand on good crimp below his lip. Traverse right along his smile to the other edge, and finish going up on Slots V0. Both of Harold’s eyes are on.
content.location: Find Harold’s face looking towards the street.

content.description: Start sitting just right of jutting piece of rock.  Climb up using the slots and some
content.location: Prow of boulder as you head around the back, #4 on the beta photo.

content.description: Fun little problem, start matched on starting flake and climb straight up.
content.location: Left side of back face, #3 on the beta photo.

content.description: Sit start as for Snaggle tooth, right of the start to Hold Your Applause/Causing confusion and left of where Slots starts. Pull with left hand on good sloper right on large edge, move up to the lip of the boulder, get high feet and rock up and right to a good crimp just above head high on the slab face. Use that to get fully onto the slab and continue up easy terrain to the top.
content.protection: 1-2 pads, there is a boulder behind you for the start.
content.location: On the backside boulder, in the alcove where Sit Down Traverse is located. The start of the climb is right of the start to Hold Your Applause/Causing confusion and left of where Slots starts.

content.description: Start sitting at right end of the face, fire one move up and then traverse the lip to the left topping out before the nose.
content.location: Right to left travserse of the back face.  #1 on the beta photo.

content.description: Obvious little prow next to sit down traverse. Start sitting on the right on a good flake and traverse up and left on friendly holds, topping out by gaining the large jug. Would be a decent climb if it weren’t so low to the ground.
content.location: Looking at sit down traverse this will be on your right.

content.description: Right to left traverse but follow the line of smaller holds below the lip until you get to the nose on the right.  Contrived but fun.
content.location: Back face of the boulder, #2 on the beta photo.

content.description: This boulder forms the back of the alcove with Sit Down Traverse on the left and Layback/Shin Buster on the right.  The back side of this boulder has some fun short problems.
